metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29952 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: When Web Render components were destructed, a race condition could havecaused undefined behavior, and we presume that with enough effort may havebeen exploitable to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox< 88.0.1 and Firefox for Android < 88.1.3.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
